inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer, Title_
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < ago(40d)
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()

","size":0,"title":"PENDING UPDATES OLDER THAN 40 DAYS | CLIENTS | COUNT","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo1-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo1-t"],"visualization":"tiles","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":10000},"tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"total","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"min":0,"palette":"redBright"}},"showBorder":false}}

inputs.name: StepSettings
inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdatePendingUpdatesV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer, Title_
| where LastDeploymentChangeTime < ago(40d)
| where UpdateClassification notcontains "Drivers"
| sort by Computer asc
| distinct Computer
| summarize total = count()

inputs.value:

inputs.value:
{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"InvClientWindowsUpdateLastInstallationsV2_CL
| summarize CollectionTime = arg_max(CollectionTime,*) by Computer,Title_
| where Date_ > ago(31d)
| where KB != "KB2267602"
| project-reorder Computer,UserLoggedOn,Title_,KB,Result,UpdateTarget,ClientApplicationID
","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"WINDOWS UPDATE INSTALLATIONS HISTORY, NO DEFENDER AV (LAST 31 DAYS) | CLIENTS | GROUPED","noDataMessageStyle":5,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["/subscriptions/fce4f282-fcc6-43fb-94d8-bf1701b862c3/resourceGroups/rg-logworkspaces-client-demo1-t/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/log-management-client-demo1-t"],"gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Group","formatter":1}],"rowLimit":10000,"filter":true,"hierarchySettings":{"treeType":1,"groupBy":["ClientApplicationID","UpdateTarget"]}}}
